QuestData.Title: Feeding Shal'Aran
QuestData.Description: With leyline energy feeding in from Anora, this chamber can begin to awaken.$B$BIt will be a slow process, and we must take care to mask this activity from our enemies, a process which itself requires enormous effort and focus.$B$BFurthermore, there is the conundrum of actually consuming the mana in this form. A stream too weak is not enough to provide sustenance - too powerful and it would vaporize us.$B$BThere is much work to be done yet. For now, let us examine the feed.
QuestData.LogDescription: Examine the Leyline Feed in Shal'Aran with Arcanist Valtrois.
QuestData.RewardText: I will call upon you again, I am sure.
